original_text: And Aaron shall come into the tabernacle of the congregation, and shall put off the linen garments, which he put on when he went into the holy place, and shall leave them there:
korean_text: 아론은 회막에 들어가서 지성소에 들어갈 때에 입었던 세마포 옷을 벗어 거기 두고

sentences.original_text: And Aaron shall come into the tabernacle of the congregation
and shall put off the linen garments
when he went into the holy place
